channel.title: The Feeling Maker - Handicapped physician turns into a biological hacker by breaking into the patient´s defense lines during consultation.
channel.description: The Feeling Maker - Handicapped physician turns into a biological hacker by breaking into the patient´s defense lines during consultation.

item.title: It is of the utmost importance to understand the role of the uncinate fasciculus in human life. It is two-way myelinated nerve cell bundle that connects older regions of the temporal lobe to the more recently evolved thinking and deciding forebrain areas. Yes, it is a two-way road but what we see in practice is that the hyper-reactive link under the influence of the amygdala is much more powerful that the rational or even feeling-driven influence of the frontal areas on our behavior.
item.description: It is of the utmost importance to understand the role of the uncinate fasciculus in human life. It is two-way myelinated nerve cell bundle that connects older regions of the temporal lobe to the more recently evolved thinking and deciding forebrain areas. Yes, it is a two-way road but what we see in practice is that the hyper-reactive link under the influence of the amygdala is much more powerful that the rational or even feeling-driven influence of the frontal areas on our behavior.

item.title: The Feeling Maker
item.description:
The Feeling Maker

Well, first day at The Grid. Created The Feeling Maker page. First episode of this genuine story to come soon.
